Note: For a very similar hymn see 3860.
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: James Ryman, a hymn to the Virgin Mary — eight quatrains (aabb) with refrain ‘for vs thou pray vnto thy childe’, and burden: ‘O quene of grace O mary myelde / ffor vs thou pray vnto thy childe’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O closed gate of EzechielO plentevous mounte of
                    Daniel…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…In heuyn blisse o mary myeldeffor vs thou pray vnto thy
                    childe
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,

         89 (1892): 167-338: 173-4.

            1977: 142-3; 1977, 126-7.
